full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYIS TSOGS MCHOD 'KHOR BYA TSUL GYI CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (ZHES PA 'DI NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CING GIR GNAS KYI RGYAL PO'I RIGS LAS DANG, STOBS 'BYOR BA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I HAL KHA RNAM RGYAL DBANG GIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL PA'I NGOR, 'JAM DBYANGS DGONG MA'I LUNG GIS KVON TIR PHU'U SHAN PA CHI TA KOO SHI LCAN SKYA HU THOG THU ZHES 'BOD PA RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYIS @003A TSOGS MCHOD KYIS CHO GA'I YIG CHA MA MTHONG KYANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO MDZAD PA'I RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG GIS SGRUB THABS NAS BYUNG BA PHYOGS MTHUN PAR BSAM NAS DE NYID GZHIR BYAS TE, MDOR BSDUS LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BGOD PA'I YI GE PA NI GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS PA SMRA BA'I SPOBS PA CAN BLO BZANG NYI MA'O, , DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG ,)
